mapper.insert: INSERT INTO canteen_review (id, evaluator_id, name, time, comment, canteen_id, evaluation_score, weight) VALUES (#{id}, #{evaluatorId}, #{name}, #{time}, #{comment}, #{canteenId}, #{evaluationScore}, #{weight})
mapper.update: UPDATE canteen_review SET evaluator_id = #{evaluatorId}, name = #{name}, time = #{time}, comment = #{comment}, canteen_id = #{canteenId}, evaluation_score = #{evaluationScore}, weight = #{weight} WHERE id = #{id}
